svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Primary energy consumption by source, World
Primary energy consumption by source across the world's regions, measured in terawatt-hours (TWh). Note that this
data does not include energy sourced from traditional biomass, which may form a significant component of primary
energy consumption in low to middle-income countries. 'Other renewables' includes renewable sources including
wind, geothermal, solar, biomass and waste.
